problem.problem_statement: What are some fun ways to teach people about the importance of bees?
problem.goalTitle: Ensure sustainable consumption and production patterns

problem.problem_statement: How can wetlands help clean water and control floods?
problem.goalTitle: Ensure availability and sustainable management of water and sanitation for all

problem.problem_statement: How can insurance help manage flood risks?
problem.goalTitle: Promote sustained, inclusive and sustainable economic growth, full and productive employment and decent work for all

problem.problem_statement: How can communities help manage and protect forests?
problem.goalTitle: Strengthen the means of implementation and revitalize the Global Partnership for Sustainable Development

problem.problem_statement: How can schools help protect plants and bees?
problem.goalTitle: Ensure inclusive and equitable quality education and promote lifelong learning opportunities for all
